content.rendered: Pasang Kamera CCTV dari Honeywell HBD3PR1 untuk kebutuhan kamera pengawas. Kamera CCTV Honeywell HBD3PR1 sangat efektif dalam menaga keamanan rumah / kantor / gedung / dlsb. Jenis kamera Honeywell type HBD3PR1 memiliki spesifikasi:Honeywell : HBD1PR1/HBD3PR1/ Performance Series IP 3 MP True Day/Night IR Indoor/Outdoor Bullet Camera HBD3PR1 are affordable, fully featured IP cameras that pair perfectly with a 4/8/16-channel Performance Series Embedded NVR*. Superior Image Quality • HBD3PR1: 3 MP (20 fps) and Full HD 1080p (25/30 fps) image with 1/3` 3 MP sensor, true widescreen image on a 16:9 display, 12.5% more horizontal pixel density than conventional 3 MP 4:3 (2048×1536) cameras • True Day/Night capability, vivid colour pictures by day and clear black-and-white pictures at night with ICR • Excellent low-light performance with 3D Noise Reduction, saving storage and bandwidth together with H.264 High Profile codec Flexible Surveillance Solution • IR LEDs provide up to 30 m (100 ft) of illumination in dimly lit or nighttime scenes • Smart IR technology for even distribution of IR • Waterproof (IP66) camera housing is perfect for outdoor installations .6 mm F2.1 fixed lens HBD3PR1 provide wide range of field of view options • Monitor from anywhere using HonView Touch mobile app for both Apple® and Android™ smart phones and tablet computers • Configurable motion detection and camera tamper detection settings, including configurable alarm notifications

excerpt.rendered: Honeywell : HBD1PR1/HBD3PR1/ Performance Series IP 3 MP True Day/Night IR Indoor/Outdoor Bullet Camera HBD3PR1 are affordable, fully featured IP cameras that pair perfectly with a 4/8/16-channel Performance Series Embedded NVR*. Superior Image Quality • HBD3PR1: 3 MP (20 fps) and Full HD 1080p (25/30 fps) image with 1/3` 3 MP sensor, true widescreen image on a 16:9 display, 12.5% more horizontal pixel density than conventional 3 MP 4:3 (2048×1536) cameras • True Day/Night capability, vivid colour pictures by day and clear black-and-white pictures at night with ICR • Excellent low-light performance with 3D Noise Reduction, saving storage and bandwidth together with H.264 High Profile codec Flexible Surveillance Solution • IR LEDs provide up to 30 m (100 ft) of illumination in dimly lit or nighttime scenes • Smart IR technology for even distribution of IR • Waterproof (IP66) camera housing is perfect for outdoor installations .6 mm F2.1 fixed lens HBD3PR1 provide wide range of field of view options • Monitor from anywhere using HonView Touch mobile app for both Apple® and Android™ smart phones and tablet computers • Configurable motion detection and camera tamper detection settings, including configurable alarm notifications
